thread.title: Tourists enjoy blooming rapeseed flowers at Chongkan scenic spot in Chongqing

author: 刘艺璇
title: Tourists enjoy blooming rapeseed flowers at Chongkan scenic spot in Chongqing
text:
Tourists enjoy blooming rapeseed flowers at Chongkan scenic spot in Chongqing
Updated: March 13, 2025 08:44
Xinhua
Tourists take a cable car to enjoy the scenery of rapeseed flowers at Chongkan scenic spot in Tongnan District, southwest China's Chongqing Municipality, March 12, 2025. As spring unfolds, rapeseed flowers here have entered the blooming season, attracting tourists to visit. [Photo/Xinhua]
Tourists pose for photos at Chongkan scenic spot in Tongnan District, southwest China's Chongqing Municipality, March 12, 2025. [Photo/Xinhua]
An aerial drone photo taken on March 12, 2025 shows a train running across Chongkan scenic spot in Tongnan District, southwest China's Chongqing Municipality. [Photo/Xinhua]
Tourists enjoy the scenery of rapeseed flowers at Chongkan scenic spot in Tongnan District, southwest China's Chongqing Municipality, March 12, 2025. [Photo/Xinhua]
An aerial drone photo taken on March 12, 2025 shows tourists enjoying the scenery of rapeseed flowers at Chongkan scenic spot in Tongnan District, southwest China's Chongqing Municipality. [Photo/Xinhua]
An aerial drone photo taken on March 12, 2025 shows a tourist boat sailing on the water at Chongkan scenic spot in Tongnan District, southwest China's Chongqing Municipality. [Photo/Xinhua]
An aerial drone photo taken on March 12, 2025 shows the scenery of rapeseed flowers at Chongkan scenic spot in Tongnan District, southwest China's Chongqing Municipality, March 12, 2025. [Photo/Xinhua]
Tourists pose for photos at Chongkan scenic spot in Tongnan District, southwest China's Chongqing Municipality, March 12, 2025. [Photo/Xinhua]
